function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in service systems due to enhanced social and emotional links with individual actors within the service system","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks within service environments","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, maintaining social distancing, and promoting vaccination among service providers and users","Technologies":"Contactless service delivery systems, IoT-based occupancy monitoring and management systems","People":"Service providers, service users, and staff within the service system","Owner":"Service providers, management"}]}
